summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Diabetes Prediction ML application. Backend API fully functional with 100% test success rate. Frontend UI working correctly with all features operational. Both Logistic Regression and Random Forest models trained successfully and providing accurate predictions.
passed_tests: Model metrics endpoint returns correct structure with all 5 metrics for both models
Prediction endpoint accepts valid input and returns structured predictions
Edge case predictions (all zeros, high values) handled correctly
Invalid input validation returns proper 422 status code
Frontend page loads with correct title and layout
Model metrics card displays all performance metrics for both models
All 8 input fields present with correct data-testid attributes
Predict button submits form and displays results from both models
Reset button clears form and hides prediction results
Prediction results show correct format with probabilities and outcomes
HTML5 form validation prevents invalid numeric input (expected behavior)
